Text:
Shortly after the kidnapping of Princess Alexia was
safely resolved...
(I cannot believe him...!)

(I've gone to check on Cid I don't know how many
times now, and he's always off on some errand or
another!)

(...Knowing him, he's intentionally pretending to be
out so I won't worry.)

(But today is the day I put an end to that ruse. I'm
going to see if he's safe or sound if it's the lastâ€”)
There you are!
Huh?
Stop right there, Cid! Just what are you up to?!
Ack! Er, I mean, wha...? Cl-Claire...?
What's with the scary face?
Don't "what's with the scary face" me.

I've come by your dormitory room I don't know how
many times, and you're never there, and I take it
you've been ignoring my calling for you as well.
Huh? Have I really?

Oh please, spare me the feigned innocence. Do you
have any idea how concerned I was...?
Wait, what happened to your face? Were you tortured?!

Huh? Oh, uh... Well, I'm pretty much healed up, so no
need to get all worked up.

Cid sheepishly averts his eyes, and Claire realizes
she was right.
(It's all clear now...)
(Cid was avoiding me so I wouldn't see these wounds.)

(Wait! That means...he might actually be hiding 
even worse!)

(Yes... I know better than anyone just how thoughtful
of a boy Cid is.)
Claire clenches Cid's shoulders.
Eep?! Uh... Wh-What're you doing...?
Cid, let your sister see your body.
Um... But we're in the middle of the cafeteria.
Never mind that. Take off your shirt, and show me!
Aw, man... C-Cut me some slack! This is embarrassing!
Come now, no struggling!
M-My shirt's gonna rip...!
I'll stitch it up for you good as new! Be thankful.

So you're basically saying I should let my shirt get
ruined...?!
Did I just hear a mouse squeak?

N-No... B-But, c'mon, right here...? People are
watching...
That is enough to snap Claire to her senses.
(Tch... He has a point. This is a tad too visible.)
Come with me.
Ack...! I-I get it, you don't need to drag me!

We shouldn't have to worry about anyone finding us
here. Now, be a good boy, and let me have a look.
O-Okay, I give up...

Cid opens the buttons of his shirt, revealing white
bandages wrapped all around his torso.
Well. I've seen enough. Cover yourself back up.
Uh...already? Okay...

Cid buttons his shirt back up. Seeing him so meek
pains Claire all the more.

(That bandaging... He must have been hurt quite
badly. At least it appears his wounds are closed...
But how dare they do such horrible things to my
dear brother!)
Claire suddenly feels an intense burning within her.
Uh, Claire...?

I take it the Knight Order did this under Zenon's
directive?
N-No... It was the princess...
What?! How dare they...!

They need a taste of their own medicine... No, I will
make them wish they had died before laying their
hands on my brother!
H-Hey now, no need to get so fired up, Claire!

(Hearing him speak my name so urgently just hammers
home how terrified he must have been!)
...This is my fault.
U-Uh, Claire...?

If this is what it would come to, I should have been
much more strict and thorough when I trained you
in the sword.
Ulp.

C-C'mon... None of this is your fault. And I'm a
complete and utter scrub with the sword anyway...

No, that's not true. You are more than capable if
you try.

...Yes! If only you were stronger, you wouldn't have
any problems whatsoever!
Yep, she didn't hear a word I just said.

You never would've been caught to begin with if you
were strong. If by chance you get attacked, all you
need do is fend them off. And if in the worst-case
scenario you're captured, you won't be tortured!

No way... If I do something like fight off the Order,
they'll call it high treason.

I'm not speaking only of what happened this time. I'm
speaking of becoming stronger for what may lie ahead.

There'd be no worry of you being taken hostage if you
could fend for yourself better, wouldn't you agree?
Uh, just what is it you think is going to happen?

You are the son of a baron. I should think you would
need to maintain an appropriate level of awareness.

But...what if even after all that I still get taken
hostage sometime like you did?

Um... Well, that's different! If you're strong to
begin with, I won't need to show restraint or
mercy even if I do have to rescue you...
Nothing but good can come of it!

Um, shouldn't your first priority in that situation
be my safety...?

Wouldn't you agree that you have a greater chance of
being unharmed if I can save you with the quickest,
most direct means possible? No need for reason when
brute force will prevail!
In other words, "might makes right", eh...

All right, I've decided! I'm putting together a
special training regimen for you, so clear your
calendar!
Huh? Uh, hold on just aâ€”

There will be no holding on! This is an order from
your sister!

Now then, I'll head back to the Order to arrange my
schedule. Make sure you are good and prepared,
understood? Hehe...!
This is not gonna be any fun at all...
